programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Those who care
programme.desc: Over 4,000 official volunteers and thousands of those who came at the call of their hearts: the program "Nebyduzhi" reveals the face of foreign volunteering in Ukraine. This is a story about people who exchanged foreign comfort for risky work for the sake of supporting Ukrainians. For them, help has no visas or borders, and saving lives - both military and civilian - has become the main mission.

programme.desc: A weekly in-depth one-on-one interview hosted by journalist Saken Aymurzaev. The main guests are people of good will, typically Russians who have "taken the side of good" and strongly condemn Russias insidious war against Ukraine.

programme.title: Daytime News

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: Mēs visi svešinieki
programme.desc: Šajā aizkustinošajā, provokatīvajā stāstā par mīlestību, ģimeni un pagātnes rēgiem Ādams dzīvo vientuļu dzīvi, taču kādu vakaru viņu apciemo noslēpumains kaimiņš, kurš uzjundī sen apspiestas jūtas un atmiņas. Abu starpā rodas saikne un nenoliedzamas simpātijas, un Ādams nonāk savā bērnības mājā, kurā 30 gadus pēc nāves šķietami dzīvo viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Pagraba durvis
programme.desc: Meklējot jaunu dzīves sākumu pēc spontānā aborta, pāris saņem dāvanā savu sapņu māju ar vienu nosacījumu – viņi nekad nedrīkst atvērt pagraba durvis. Vai viņi var dzīvot, nezinot, kas tur ir? Šī iekšā cīņa ar neziņu izraisa šokējošas sekas.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un, kaut gan diezgan negribīgi, arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamies glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Sekmīgais uzņēmējs Žoslēns ir patmīlīgs, no sevis noguris brunču mednieks. Iekarojot sieviešu uzmanību, pavedējam nav šķēršļu. Lai savaldzinātu jaunu skaistu medicīnas māsu, viņš izliekas par invalīdu, kam uz mūžu lemts palikt ratiņkrēslā. Viņa savukārt iepazīstina viņu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām pārvietojas ratiņkrēslā. Notiek kas savāds... Kad jūtas gūst virsroku, Žoslēns pats kļūst par krāpšanās upuri - atklāt patiesību ir arvien grūtāk.

programme.title: Rozalīna
programme.desc: Ikviens zina stāstu par Romeo un Džuljetu. Taču šajā stāstā iztrūkst kāda svarīga nianse – pirms Džuljetas bija viņas māsīca Rozalīna. Rozalīna ir līdz ausīm iemīlējusies Romeo un ir pārliecināta, ka abi ir kā radīti viens otram. Gadiem ilgi Rozalīna sapņo, kaut Romeo viņu noskūpstītu, un tad tas patiešām notiek! Viss šķiet ideāli, taču tad viņas māsīca Džuljeta pārceļas atpakaļ uz pilsētu un iekaro Romeo sirdi. Un tas vēl nav viss – Rozalīna uzzina par Džuljetas un Romeo pašnāvības plāniem. Vai viņa pagūs abus apturēt?

programme.title: Viņš ir viņa
programme.desc: Ļoti brīva Šekspīra lugas "Divpadsmitā nakts" ekranizācija. Pārvācoties uz citu skolu, Viola maina arī savu izskatu un uzdodas par savu dvīņubrāli Sebastjanu, kurš pats pārcēlies uz Londonu. Taču meitene nemaz nenojauš, ka viņu gaida pārsteigums, – viņa iemīlēsies savā istabas biedrā un skolas karstākajā puisī Djūkā, kura sirds savukārt pieder skaistulei Olīvijai. Taču šī meitene ir pamanījusi Sebastjanu – emocionālo puisi, kādi viņai vienmēr patikuši. Un, kaut arī šķiet, ka nekas nevar būt vēl trakāk, ierodas īstais Sebastjans, kurš nemaz nenojauš, ka viņu aizvieto paša dvīņu māsa!

programme.title: Šreks
programme.desc: Kādā tālā zemē ļaunais valdnieks izraida uz mežu visus pasaku varoņus, lai zeme būtu tikpat garlaicīga kā pats valdnieks. Lielā milža Šreka mājvieta pārtop par bēgļu nometni. Tāpēc viņš nolemj atrast bargo valdnieku un pārliecināt, lai viņš atļauj zemes iemītniekiem atgriezties mājās. Valdnieks piekrīt, bet ar vienu nosacījumu – Šrekam jāatrod un jāatved daiļā princese Fiona, kuru ļaunais valdnieks nolēmis apprecēt, lai kļūtu par karali.

programme.title: Adaptācija
programme.desc: Pazīstams dramaturgs Čārlijs Kaufmans (Nikolass Keidžs) saņem pasūtījumu uzrakstīt filmas scenāriju pēc grāmatas "Orhideju zaglis" motīviem. Tajā žurnāliste Sūzena Orleāna (Merila Strīpa) apraksta avantūristu Džonu Laroču, kas ir tiesāts par īpašu orhideju zādzību no rezervāta. Nespēdams izdomāt scenārijam adekvātu sižeta noslēgumu Čārlijs piekrīt dvīņubrāļa piedāvājumam izsekot žurnālisti. Izrādās, ka grāmatā aprakstītie notikumi ievērojami atšķiras no realitātes un ziedu zagšanai ir pavisam citi iemesli. Sūzena izrādās iesaistījusies avantūrista Laroča dzīvē vairāk nekā parasta vērotāja no malas.

programme.title: Barijs Sīls: Īstens amerikānis
programme.desc: Stāsts par Bariju Sīlu, amerikāņu lidmašīnas pilotu, kurš iefiltrējās narkotiku kartelī CIP slepena uzdevuma ietvaros 20. gs. 80. gados, kas tiek atmaskots kā pret Irānu vērsta militāra operācija.

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Ciems
programme.desc: Kādā ciemā, tālu no pārējās pasaules, norisinās atgadījumu virkne, kas liek iedzīvotājiem apšaubīt savas līdzšinējās pārliecības.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Šreks
programme.desc: Princeses Fionas vecāki ielūdz savu meitu un viņas jauno vīru uz svinīgām pusdienām savā pilī. Taču karaļpāris ij nenojauš, kā izskatās jaunais znots un cik ļoti viņu mazā meitiņa ir pārvērtusies... Gan Fiona, gan viņas iemīļotais Šreks ir zaļi, milzīgi cilvēkēdāji! Vai jaunlaulātajiem ir kaut mazākās cerības iegūt pavalstnieku labvēlību?

programme.title: Šreks Trešais
programme.desc: Šreks apprecēja princesi Fionu, bet kļūt par Tāltālās karaļvalsts karali neietilpa viņa plānos. Taču kad viņa sievastēvs karalis Herolds saslima, Šrekam bija vai nu jāatrod piemērots kandidāts karaļa tronim, vai arī jāatsakās no klusās un mierīgās dzīves purvā, lai kāptu tronī. Tādēļ kopā ar labākajiem draugiem Ēzelīti un Runci Zābakos Šreks devās uzmeklēt to, kurš, viņaprāt, būtu karaļa troņa cienīgs – Fionas radinieku Ārtiju. Kamēr Šreks bija ceļā, Tāltālajā karaļvalstī notika trakas lietas: Daiļais princis kopā ar sliktajiem pasaku varoņiem iebruka pilsētā, lai sagrābtu varu.

programme.title: Šreks: ilgi un laimīgi
programme.desc: Cilvēkēdājs Šreks jau uzveicis ļaunu pūķi, atbrīvojis skaistu princesi un izglābis sievas ģimenes pārvaldīto karaļvalsti, bet tagad, pēc visa piedzīvotā, Šreks sāk ilgoties pēc vecās, labās cilvēkēdāja dzīves, kad ciema iedzīvotāji no viņa baidījās, nevis prasīja autogrāfus. Tāpēc, nedomājot par sekām, zaļais milzis noslēdz vienošanos ar viltīgo Rumpelrūķi. Parakstot līgumu, Šreks attopas ačgārnā un greizā Tāltālajā. Lai glābtu draugus, atjaunotu kārtību savā pasaulē un atgūtu Fionu, Šrekam būs krietni jāpacīnās.

programme.title: Pats labākais
programme.desc: Zvejas kuģa "Finestkind" apkalpei jādodas bīstamos ūdeņos, lai atmaksātu parādus.

programme.title: Bestsellers
programme.desc: Untumains pensionēts rakstnieks negribīgi sāk piedalīties savas pēdējās grāmatas veicināšanas kampaņā, lai izpalīdzētu jaunai izdevējai.

programme.title: Melnais lācis
programme.desc: Radošu krīzi piedzīvojoša filmu veidotāja meklē vienatni kādā lauku retrītā, taču saprot, ka mežs tikai piešķir spēku viņas iekšējiem dēmoniem.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Basketbols: NCAA. TCU - Kansas
programme.desc: Action from an NCAA Championship event.

programme.title: Basketbols: NBA Action. 3512. raidījums
programme.desc: Interesting sports magazine that gives viewers a chance to find out all the latest NBA news, and see all the exciting action and top highlights from the matches.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Panathinaikos - Virtus
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Valencia - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Dubai - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA. Chicago Bulls - Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Caribbean Life

With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Build Me Up
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: With their clients baby on the way, Mike and Denese race to correct death-trap stairs and a kitchen with a foul secret.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a fisherman capture footage of a giant sea serpent known as "Caddy?" Whats the explanation for the mysterious blue and green flashing lights, witnessed by hundreds of people, in Lubbock, Texas in August of 1951?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul deploy the largest piece of equipment theyve ever used to dig deeper into the mystery of the possible alien spacecraft buried in the lower meadow of Mt. Wilson ranch, but their investigation is threatened by mysterious interference.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Human Genesis. Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Human Genesis. Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Digging for the Truth
programme.desc: An intriguing exploration of some of the most incredible ancient mysteries located all around the world. The presenter questions the existing theories on the subjects, talks to experts and gives his own hypothesis on what could have happened. Join this amazing historical journey as iconic mysteries such as the Egyptian pyramids, the Holy Grail and the Lost Ark of the Covenent are explored.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Beneath the waters of north western Canada a fifty foot monster is said to lurk. Stories from Canadas Lake Okanagan date back to the First Nation peoples, who lived in fear of this terrifying creature of the lake that became known as Ogopogo.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Mariners have long told stories of beasts stalking the coasts of Florida, but what if new video could prove that old sailors were seeing real sea monsters? A forked tail, ferocious teeth and a large body were all characteristics of the sea monsters.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Documentary series in which viewers have a chance to explore the mysteries and reveal secrets and hidden facts of the worlds most famous and oldest book - the Bible. For thousands of years, The Holy Bible has been the foundation on which Judaism and Christianity are built, but there are still many secrets and things which can be interpreted differently. Featuring stunning on-location photography, interesting reenactments and interviews with scientists, archaeologists and religious leaders, this series will take us on remarkable journey back in time to see what the Old Testament and the New Testament are hiding from us - from Dead Sea Scrolls, examinations of the traditional belief that Moses wrote the Torah, to whether Adam and Eve were created together or one before the other, who authored the New Testament and many other mysteries.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Documentary series in which viewers have a chance to explore the mysteries and reveal secrets and hidden facts of the worlds most famous and oldest book - the Bible. For thousands of years, The Holy Bible has been the foundation on which Judaism and Christianity are built, but there are still many secrets and things which can be interpreted differently. Featuring stunning on-location photography, interesting reenactments and interviews with scientists, archaeologists and religious leaders, this series will take us on remarkable journey back in time to see what the Old Testament and the New Testament are hiding from us - from Dead Sea Scrolls, examinations of the traditional belief that Moses wrote the Torah, to whether Adam and Eve were created together or one before the other, who authored the New Testament and many other mysteries.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Travel the globe alongside modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, and go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: American Monster

programme.title: Cabin In the Woods
programme.desc: Benjamin Peter Ashley, an unpredictable and violent outdoorsman, leads investigators down his path of devastation, resulting in an 18-day manhunt.

programme.title: Cabin In the Woods

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series. Charlotte is North Carolinas most populous city, a metropolis with a hot, subtropical climate. But underneath its warm facade lay a cold underbelly of criminal activity, a world detective Gary McFadden knows all too well. Now retired following a 34-year career with the Charlotte Mecklenburg Police Department (CMPD), the decorated officer, along with his colleagues, retells some of his most memorable and chilling cases. These brutal crimes sent shockwaves through the city and the officers relive some of Charlottes most unforgettable and harrowing murders.

programme.title: Breaking Homicide
programme.desc: The most tragic crimes are the ones that never reached a conclusion, lives have been lost and no one ever held accountable as the case eventually goes cold. What happens when years pass by with no justice? Police Detective Derrick Levasseur and Forensic Psychologist Kris Mohandiewill are on a mission to reopen cases and find answers for the victims and loved ones who need to finally feel peace. Theyll be looking into cases such as Michelle OKeefe and Devan Schmidt murders, re-examining old clues and sourcing new ones, will they be able to find details that have previously been missed?

programme.title: Home Sweet Homicide
programme.desc: Home. Its the place where we feel safe, secure, loved and at peace. But not all homes are so lucky. No matter how many locks, bolts, alarms and cameras we install, if someone wants to get in, theyll find a way. This true-crime documentary series reveals murders committed inside peoples homes, showing how twisted individuals invaded the private sanctuaries of American citizens to brutally slay them in their humble abode. Detectives share their experiences from working on these cases, dissecting their abnormalities and presenting the peculiar pieces of evidence that baffled them as they attempted to identify the culprit.

programme.title: I am Homicide
programme.desc: Thrilling docu-crime series that revisits some of the most compelling cases former Charlotte Detective Garry McFadden, known simply as Homicide, has solved in his 35 year long career. Charismatic and intelligent, he used his street smarts to work the neighborhoods, gather critical information and solve over 800 cases, putting himself in dangerous situations on a daily basis. Detective McFadden often knew those involved- the victims, the family members and sometimes even the culprits. The series features his incredible stories, dramatic reenactments and present-day interviews with family members of victims.

programme.title: Evil Stepmothers

Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Chandra Levy: A Mistress Murdered
programme.desc: This true-crime dramatisation tells the disturbing story of the musterious disappearance and brutal murder of 24-year-old Chandra Levy, an intern at the Federal Bureau of Prisons in Washington, D.C. The case shocked America when a leak pointed the finger of suspicion at her alleged lover, Congressman Gary Condit. However, due to a botched investigation by the MPD, the real killer managed to go undetected until his arrest and conviction many years later.

programme.title: Death by Fame
programme.desc: Adea Shabani crossed oceans to pursue her Hollywood dreams. When she suddenly goes missing, investigators pray she wont become one of the citys lost angels.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A captivating documentary series exploring real-life murder cases, and as the evidence slowly unfolds, viewers are left guessing the identity of the killer. Each episode flashes forward to the engrossing courtroom proceedings, whilst in the meantime the mystery of the chilling murder is slowly being unravelled, and each new clue presents a possible new culprit. With each twist and turn, the truth begins to emerge, before a damning piece of new evidence or testimony flips the case on its head once more.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath

With each twist and turn, the truth begins to emerge, before a damning piece of new evidence or testimony flips the case on its head once more.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Chilling true-crime documentary series that explores the relationships that ended with fatal result. Series features archive footage, dramatic reconstructions and interviews with family, friends and law enforcement. From a suspicious carbon monoxide incident, a parrot who became an eyewitness to murder, to a spouse with a spiraling gambling addiction, and a motorcycle accident that is not what it seems, each episode will uncover the breaking point in each of these complex and toxic relationships and tell a tragic tale of what happens when love becomes lethal.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Just because a case is closed doesnt mean the truth has been revealed. Suicide or murder? Runaway or kidnapping? Accidental or premeditated? Each episode of STILL A MYSTERY re-examines a single crime case where unanswered questions still remain. Through original interviews with law enforcement, family members and private investigators, news footage and social media, STILL A MYSTERY dissects the evidence and presents new theories in a quest to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Still A Mystery

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. Some familiar faces like Barri Ghai, founder of The Ghostfinder Paranormal Society and and the shows investigator and paranormal tech expert, as well as world renowned psychic Chris Fleming join Jayne Harris, Paranormal Researcher. They travel the UK and visit houses and petrified families troubled by hauntings, and using the latest technology try to capture never before seen proof of the paranormal.

programme.desc: One of the most successful paranormal series of all time is back? And, its bigger and better than ever. Original cast member Grant Wilson returns with an all-star, handpicked team to help people struggling with unexplained supernatural phenomena. New proprietary ghost-hunting technology will allow viewers to actually see a ghost for the first time on television.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Aвторский проект Вадима Кондакова. Это получасовые документальные истории о местах и людях, о которых мало кто знает. И которые станут для зрителя настоящим открытием. Автор побывал в самой самой западной точке страны, в Калининграде, где люди, без света и воды, живут в казематах заброшенного немецкого форта XIX века. И на далеких Курильских островах, в городе-призраке, про жителей которых почему-то забыли на материке. Кроме того, "Неизвестная Россия" расскажет о том, что за таинственный сигнал из космоса поймали в астрофизической обсерватории Нижнего Архыза. И можно ли стать дорожным полицейским, если ты родился в городе дальнобойщиков. В общем, "Неизвестная Россия" показывает страну такой, какой ее не знают даже сами россияне.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. Она работает официанткой в ресторане и посещает встречи анонимных алкоголиков. Её мать Бонни Планкетт, также как и дочь, справилась с зависимостью от алкоголя и наркотиков и хочет наладить отношения с дочерью. Семнадцатилетняя дочь Вайолет, родившаяся, когда Кристи было всего 16 лет, ждет ребёнка от своего приятеля Люка. У Кристи также есть второй ребёнок - Роско, от бывшего парня по имени Бакстер. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Главная героиня воспитывает двух детей от разных браков, заботится об отце-алкоголике и пытается наладить личную жизнь. Старшая дочь Анька учится в ПТУ, думает, что она единственный адекватный член семьи и в её жизни все будет по-другому, младший сын Тимофей, чей отец вернулся к первой семье в Азербайджан, считает, что он уже мужчина, хотя ему всего лишь 11 лет, отец Ольги, бывший футболист, крепко выпивает и постоянно врет, а сестра Ленка пытается жить за счет мужчин, в основном — женатых. Вечно спасая родственников от неприятностей, Ольга живет чужой жизнью и редко думает о себе — до тех пор, пока в нее не влюбляется молодой и положительный водитель газели "Ритуал" Гриша.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Главная героиня воспитывает двух детей от разных браков, заботится об отце-алкоголике и пытается наладить личную жизнь. Старшая дочь Анька учится в ПТУ, думает, что она единственный адекватный член семьи и в её жизни все будет по-другому, младший сын Тимофей, чей отец вернулся к первой семье в Азербайджан, считает, что он уже мужчина, хотя ему всего лишь 11 лет, отец Ольги, бывший футболист, крепко выпивает и постоянно врет, а сестра Ленка пытается жить за счет мужчин, в основном — женатых. Вечно спасая родственников от неприятностей, Ольга живет чужой жизнью и редко думает о себе — до тех пор, пока в нее не влюбляется молодой и положительный водитель газели "Ритуал" Гриша.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Всё равно ты будешь мой
programme.desc: В центре сюжета - любовный треугольник: заключив с друзьями пари, представитель "золотой молодежи" Никита соблазняет студентку-отличницу Алену. После долгих ухаживаний он добивается внимания девушки, которая верит в искренность его чувств. В то же время в Алену безответно влюблен бедный студент Миша. У него нет возможности преподносить ей дорогие подарки или устраивать прогулки на яхте, поэтому парень считает себя недостойным ее любви. Вскоре Никита бросает Алену, и теперь она упорно работает над собой, чтобы доказать, что достойна быть рядом с ним: учит языки, берет уроки этикета, меняет имидж. Любовный роман, который начинался с глупой шутки, превратился в историю длиною в жизнь, которая разрешится самым неожиданным образом.

programme.title: Всё равно ты будешь мой
programme.desc: В центре сюжета - любовный треугольник: заключив с друзьями пари, представитель "золотой молодежи" Никита соблазняет студентку-отличницу Алену. programme.title: Всё равно ты будешь мой
programme.desc: На мальчишнике Никита изменяет Алене и сознается ей в этом. И несмотря на это они отправляются в ЗАГС, девушка не хочет отказываться, ведь Алёна сколького добилась и столько шла к любовному союзу с Никитой. Но в ЗАГСе все ощущения Алены обостряются, она задумывается: почему предательство Никиты не разбило её сердце? Возможно потому, что оно давно уже остыло к этому человеку. И почему сейчас ей так хочется оказаться в другом месте, рядом с другим человеком? Алёна не может сказать "да", она осознает, что любит Мишу. А в это время Миша собирается улететь насовсем подальше от неразделённой любви. Алена мчится в аэропорт...

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
programme.desc: Елена Ворохтина больше всего на свете мечтает о детях. Но будучи бесплодной, она пытается уговорить мужа Александра усыновить ребенка. Тот всегда находит отговорки. Вот и на этот раз он отказывается сопровождать жену в детский дом, ссылаясь на важное соглашение, а сам в это время ведет свою любовницу в ресторан. По дороге домой Елена замечает на мосту девушку, которая пыталась покончить жизнь самоубийством и уговаривает ее отказаться от необдуманного шага. Оказалось, что едва не погибшую беременную Варю бросил некий Алекс, и теперь ей негде жить.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
programme.desc: Зачастую говорят, что успешным можно быть лишь в одной жизненной сфере. Главная героиня сериала не исключение. У нее собственный бизнес, она уверенная в себе женщина, но что касается материнства - здесь ее поджидал провал. История, которая вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о том, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа. Елена успешная бизнес-вумен, но, к сожалению, ей неведома радость материнства. В прошлом она совершила ошибку. Женщина потеряла своего ребенка, но при этом сделала счастливыми другую семью. После этого она не может иметь детей, желает лишь одного - взять ребенка из детдома. Ее супруг категорически против такого решения. Любимый человек ее предает, но надежды на чудо не оставляют ее. Этастория вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о то, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
programme.desc: Зачастую говорят, что успешным можно быть лишь в одной жизненной сфере. Главная героиня сериала не исключение. У нее собственный бизнес, она уверенная в себе женщина, но что касается материнства - здесь ее поджидал провал. История, которая вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о том, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа. Елена успешная бизнес-вумен, но, к сожалению, ей неведома радость материнства. В прошлом она совершила ошибку. Женщина потеряла своего ребенка, но при этом сделала счастливыми другую семью. После этого она не может иметь детей, желает лишь одного - взять ребенка из детдома. Ее супруг категорически против такого решения. Любимый человек ее предает, но надежды на чудо не оставляют ее. Этастория вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о то, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
